section.title: Acknowledgments
section.t: Dave Noveck provided an early review that sharpened the clarity of the definitions. He also provided a more comprehensive review of the document.

section.title: RFC Editor Notes
section.t: [RFC Editor: please remove this section prior to publishing this document as an RFC]
[RFC Editor: prior to publishing this document as an RFC, please replace all occurrences of RFCTBD10 with RFCxxxx where xxxx is the RFC number of this document]
